name: Escape the Maze Find the treasure
name_original: Escape the Maze Find the treasure
description:
"Hunters" in this project meant for me - hunting for treasure.

That's why you as a player are in a maze - there are 4 ways out but only 2 will give you full win.

You can move by clicking on the screan where you want to move.

This was my first time using Unity and in a Game Jam but I think it turned better than I expected
